942170.name: INSOMNIA: The Ark - Original Soundtrack
942170.description: It’s not a secret that music plays a very important role in helping create games with rich atmosphere. INSOMNIA’s OST is no exception to that rule. 12 ambient tracks (mp3, 320 kbps) inspired by the very best (Mark Morgan, Vangelis, Gustavo Santaolalla, Max Richter, Brian Eno) and brought to you by the incredibly talented Textere Oris will provide you with perfect company both inside and outside the game.
